application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Magnolia - Front - Trim back to contain.	Currently: 4m high, 4.5m wide. Proposed final size: 4m high, 4m wideRear garden: T2 - Apple - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1m to create a tight and tidy shape. 	Currently: 3.5m high, 3.5m wide. Proposed final size: 3m high, 3m wide.T3 - Acer - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1.5m to create a tight and tidy shape. 	Currently: 3.5m high 3m wide. Proposed final size: 2.5m high, 2.5m width.  T4 - Hawthorn - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1.25m to create a tight and tidy shape. 	Currently: 4.5m high, 3.5m wide. Proposed final size: 3.5m high, 3m wide. T5 - Pear - Remove deadwood and reduce crown by approx 1.5m where neccessary.	Currently: 4.5m high, 3m wide. Proposed final size: 3.75m high, 3m wideT6 - Yew/Holly/Bay hedge - Reduce to height of red line to create a hedge. - Trim sides and reduce Holly/Bay to match in - Currently: 6-7m high, width variable. Proposed final size: 5.5m high, trim sides lightly. T7 - Apple and small trees at rear - Reduce crown of Apple and lightly prune small trees at rear - Currently 3-3.5m high and 2.5m wide - Proposed final size: 3m high, 2.5m wideT8 - Acacia - Remove deadwood and carry out aerial inspection - Remove/reduce dangerous branches. No change to outline.
